description: PIMS 4378 MFA MSP “Capacity building for integration of global environment commitments in investment/development decisions”

subproject.description: The expected outcome of this project is initiation of  a systematic and sustainable approach to assessing global environmental achievements through the implementation of  national policies, programmes and plans.  This project will also be an important contribution to the national experiences in developing and implementing tools and practices for measuring, reporting, and verifying the cost-effectiveness of official development assistance to implementing multilateral environmental agreements, in particular the Rio Conventions.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Environmental Indicators, MNE

title: PIMS 4378 MFA MSP “Capacity building for integration of
